Administration.text:
Type:
PPI
Dosage Forms: Capsule and Tablet; 15mg & 30mg
Routes of Administration: oral, IV
Common Trade Names: Prevacid

Pediatric_Dosing.text:
Age 1-11 years, weight <30kg: 15mg daily
Age >1 year, weight >30kg: 15-30mg daily

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: B
Lactation risk
: Infant risk cannot be ruled out
Renal dosing: no adjustment
Hepatic dosing: if severe, consider dose reduction

Serious.text:
C. difficile diarrhea
SJS/TEN
Rhabdomyolysis
Interstitial nephritis
Fracture
Hypomagnesemia

Common.text:
Abdominal pain, diarrhea, nausea, constipation
Headache

Pharmacology.text:
Half-life: 1.5-3 hours
Metabolism: Hepatic
Excretion: Mostly biliary/fecal

Mechanism_of_Action.text: Inhibits gastric parietal cell H+/K+ proton pump, leading to decreased gastric acid secretion
